title: Bug 49856Connector/ThreadPool link to Executor not exposed via JMX
description: Bug 49856Connector/ThreadPool link to Executor not exposed via JMX It would be helpful if this were exposed via JMX so the links between Connectors/ThreadPools and Executors could be determined.
OB: When viewing either Connector objects or ThreadPool objects via JMX the name of the executor is not shown.
